issue.title: Nullable variable length vector lastSet not set correctly
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-895](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-895). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-875 fix was incomplete. I discovered some issues with the change after it was merged. The lastSet variable needs to be adjusted in the fillEmpties() method, and lastSet needs to be set when using the copyFrom methods.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-895?focusedCommentId=15983388) by Julien Le Dem (julienledem):*
Issue resolved by pull request 601
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/601>
